remarks: Equivalence for commutes relation.  Definition of commutes in [Kalmbach] p. 20.  ( ~ cmbr analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 6-Nov-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cmtfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cmtfval.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cmtfval.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cmtfval.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
cmtfval.c $e |- C = ( cm ` K ) $.
cmtvalN $p |- ( ( K e. A /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X C Y <-> X = ( ( X ./\ Y ) .\/ ( X ./\ ( ._|_ ` Y ) ) ) ) ) $.
